channel.title: TypeScript on Andryo Marzuki
channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on Andryo Marzuki

item.title: React State Management With Redux (and More)
item.description: ReactJS is an awesome library to use for frontends. It’s super fast to use when you want to get a really interactive and intuitive application up and running. ReactJS comes prepackaged with its own way to manage state locally within a component.

item.title: Using Fetch over Axios in ReactJS Applications
item.description: For my last few projects I’ve made the switch from Axios to plain ol' Fetch. My rationale for making this switch was: Axios is a third party library. Where possible I would like to reduce usage of third party libraries; and Fetch is a perfectly capable library for the purposes of building my resuable API class with.
